IFERA (International Family Enterprise Research Academy) 2015, Hamburg – 30.06-3.07, con un paper dal titolo “How do Different TMT configurations affect family firms’ performance? The mediating role of organic and acquisitive growth strategic choices” (Santulli R., Calabrò A., Gallucci C.)

4th Journal of Management and Governance Conference, Bolzano 16-17 July 2015 con un paper dal titolo “Family Ownership concentration and internationalization: an empirical application of family principal-principal conflicts” (Calabrò A., Santulli R., Gallucci C.)

ADEIMF (Associazione degli Intermediari e mercati finanziari), 9-10 settembre 2016 Varese, con un contributo dal titolo “Credit crunch during post-financial crisis. Who is the guilty?” (Formisano V., Gallucci C., Modina M., Santulli R.)

2nd IFBRF (International Family Business Research Forum), September 15th – 16th and 17th 2016 University of Naples “Federico II”, con un paper dal titolo “Finance in Family Business Studies: Where are we now?
